channel.title: Cheatsheet on I am Georgios
channel.description: Recent content in Cheatsheet on I am Georgios

item.title: Vi cheatsheet
item.description: Navigation left/up/down/right hjkl move to the start of the file gg move to the end of file Shift+g move to the start of the next word w move to the end of the next word Shift+e move to the end of the line Shift+$ move to the start of the line 0 Actions Switch to visual mode Esc Text Edit Start Editing

item.title: Unix
item.description: File Search *find . -name “dev“: Find files containing dev in current and sub directories
